Holiday Money Get in touch Book a video call Make an enquiry Call 0800 713 715 Help Get in touch Back 1 FREE NIGHT View gallery / Back Hotel X Fortitude Valley Brisbane - Bar Hotel X Fortitude Valley Brisbane - Pool Hotel X Fortitude Valley Brisbane - Lobby Brisbane Hotel X Fortitude Valley Brisbane &vert; Return flights • 4 nights Overview Inclusions Room Type Terms & Conditions Stay in the heart of Brisbane's cool Fortitude Valley at the uber-stylish Hotel X Brisbane Fortitude Valley, an IHG Hotel. Bask in that Queensland sunshine on sunloungers by the rooftop swimming pool, before sliding over to Iris Rooftop Bar & Restaurant for a Spanish tapas feast from a private cabana. Meanwhile, francophiles everywhere can enjoy a taste of France at Bisou Bisou, an upscale in-house bistro with a Parisienne menu and innovative cocktails. View more View less 4 nights + flights from $ 1339 per person share twin Flying with Air New Zealand 1 FREE NIGHT Enquire now Sale Period : until 16 Nov 25 by 4pm or until sold out Deal includes: Return Economy class (The Works) airfares flying Air New Zealand from Auckland, Wellington or Christchurch to Brisbane 4 nights accommodation (Sun-Thurs night stays only) 1 FREE night Room Types Departs From Auckland Wellington Christchurch from Auckland Standard Room 1 x king bed Auckland 4 night package from $1339 per person share twin Sunday-Thursday night stays only Additional night from $155 per person share twin Travel 18 Jan - 31 Mar 26 Wellington 4 night package from $1359 per person share twin Sunday-Thursday night stays only Additional night from $155 per person share twin Travel 18 Jan - 31 Mar 26 Christchurch 4 night package from $1369 per person share twin Sunday-Thursday night stays only Additional night from $155 per person share twin Travel 01 Feb - 31 Mar 26 Terms & Conditions Valid for new bookings until 16 Nov 25 or until sold out. • Prices are correct as at 31 Oct 25 • Prices are thereafter subject to change without notice until time of confirmation. Prices may vary due to a number of factors including tax and surcharge increases, exchange rate movements and availability. Price is based on the most direct routing but may vary depending on subsequent tax & surcharge increases. • Full payment is required at time of booking. • All travel must be commenced and completed as specified • Some surcharges, closeouts, flight, routing and accommodation restrictions apply • Packages are subject to availability. • Advertised packages are based on Return Economy Class (The Works) flights flying Air New Zealand from Auckland, Wellington or Christchurch to Brisbane • Flights are restricted to selected day of the week schedules. • Day of the week surcharges may apply • Min/max stays apply • Share twin is based on 2 adults sharing a room, bedding configurations may vary. • If additional accommodation is required due to flight schedules this is at customers own expense • Any hotel credits that are unused are not refundable, transferable & can’t be exchanged for cash • Advertised prices are per person based on payment by cash or eftpos. Credit card fees will apply • Airfares are non-refundable, non-transferable and name changes are not permitted • Amendment and cancellation fees apply • Accommodation ratings are based on House of Travel ratings and are a guide only to the overall quality of the property • Packages are subject to availability • Product is supplied by reputable suppliers with their own terms and conditions • Please ask your House of Travel consultant for full details.
